text: Dwayne Haskins Jr. (May 3, 1997 â€“ April 9, 2022) was an American football quarterback who played in the National Football League (NFL) for three seasons. He played for the Washington Redskins / Washington Football Team from 2019 until 2020 and for the Pittsburgh Steelers in 2021. Haskins was born in Highland Park, New Jersey. Haskins was killed on April 9, 2022 in Boca Raton, Florida after getting hit by a car, aged 24. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Washington Commanders players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:American crime victims Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:Sportspeople from Maryland Category:Pedestrian road incident deaths
title: Dwayne Haskins
